title: How to Get Universal Studios Tickets from Costco

steps.title: Search for tickets on Costco's main website.
steps.content: Search for tickets on Costco's main website. Navigate to www.costco.com. In the search bar at the top, type in "Universal Studios." The search results will bring up any Universal Studios tickets if they are currently for sale, though Costco doesn't always have these tickets in stock.

steps.title: Choose your package.
steps.content: Choose your package. Often, the tickets are grouped in multiple-day deals. Sometimes, Universal Studios tickets will be combined with other offers, such as a "Go Card" that offers entrance to other attractions, too. For instance, the Go Los Angeles Card offers entrance to Six Flags, Legoland, and Knott's Berry Farm, just to name a few. For some deals, you must be a member to purchase them. Look for deals without the tag "members only" if you don't have a Costco membership.

steps.title: Create a Costco.com account if you don't have one.
steps.content: Create a Costco.com account if you don't have one. If you have a Costco membership, create an account with an email address, password, and your Costco number. If you don't have a membership, you will still need to create a Costco.com account. You just won't put in a Costco membership number.

steps.title: Pay for the tickets plus the surcharge for non-members, if applicable.
steps.content: Pay for the tickets plus the surcharge for non-members, if applicable. Once you've chosen your package, add it to your cart. Pay for the package and the shipping costs. If you're not a member, you'll also pay a 5% surcharge on the tickets. Some tickets are delivered electronically, so you won't need to pay shipping costs.

steps.title: Navigate to www.costcotravel.com.
steps.content: Navigate to www.costcotravel.com. This site is Costco's online source for purchasing travel deals and packages. It includes deals on theme parks, though they change from time to time. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Use the trip builder to search for theme park trips.
steps.content: Use the trip builder to search for theme park trips. Under "Build Your Trip," click on the "Destination" drop-down menu. Select "Theme Parks" to see all of Costco's current deals for theme parks. [2] X Research source Universal Studios may not always be listed. If it's not, check back from time to time to see if they have these tickets again.

steps.title: Pick a Universal Studios package.
steps.content: Pick a Universal Studios package. If Universal Studios is listed under the theme park packages, select it by clicking on it. Clicking on it should take you to a page with different packages for the park. The main differences between the packages are the hotels you stay at. [3] X Research source You can choose between hotels that are a part of Universal Studios or ones that are close by. Staying outside the resort is usually cheaper, and most hotels have shuttles. Staying in the resort is best if convenience is your priority.

steps.title: Decide if you want to include a flight with your package.
steps.content: Decide if you want to include a flight with your package. Once you've picked out a package, click on it. At the bottom of the page, click "Book It." Usually, this button will bring up an option for adding a flight. If you'd like to, you can include it in the package. [4] X Research source Using this option to book a flight will make the process easier. However, if you're on a budget, check with other travel sites to see if you can get a cheaper flight.

steps.title: Input the details for your trip.
steps.content: Input the details for your trip. Click on "Book It," and uncheck the "Include Flight" box if you don't want a flight. Put the dates you want to travel into the form. On the next page, select which room you prefer. [5] X Research source You can upgrade to a nicer room for an upcharge. The next few screens will show what is included with your package, such as the Universal Studios tickets and rental cars.

steps.title: Become a member if you aren't already one.
steps.content: Become a member if you aren't already one. To purchase tickets from Costco, you must be a Costco member. An individual membership in 2018 is $60 USD, and it gets you access to the store and online travel purchases. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Pay for the package and shipping fees.
steps.content: Pay for the package and shipping fees. Log in with your Costco membership number and a password, if you've created an account in the past. If you haven't, you can set up a new account. Once you're logged in, you can go to the payment page. Use a debit or credit card to pay for the package.

steps.title: Visit a Southern California Costco store.
steps.content: Visit a Southern California Costco store. Typically, Universal Studios tickets are only sold at the Southern California locations, but they don't have them all the time. If you don't live in the area, you can take a chance and visit when you get there. [7] X Research source Try calling ahead to see if they have the tickets in stock. If they don't have tickets, you can always buy them at the park at the regular price.

steps.title: Find the ticket section in Costco.
steps.content: Find the ticket section in Costco. Items like movie tickets and theme park tickets at Costco are usually with the gift cards. However, Universal Studios tickets may also be in the "Specials" section at the front of the store. If you're having trouble locating the Universal Studios tickets, locate an employee. Ask them to point you in the right direction.

steps.title: Purchase the day tickets or annual passes.
steps.content: Purchase the day tickets or annual passes. Sometimes, Costco offers Universal Studios tickets. Other times, annual passes are on sale. If you're going for more than a day, though, it's probably a good idea to buy the annual passes, as a couple of days at the park will cost as much as an annual pass. [8] X Research source
